title: Like drowning
creator_credit: Catherine Murphy, Ann Shenfield, Paul Fletcher, Robert Stephenson and Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television
brief_description: A moving animated tale about a young family who try to come to terms with the sudden death of one of the children through drowning. The family struggles to cope and adopt drastic changes in their lifestyle in order to come to terms with the ordeal.
creator_credit_for_label: Catherine Murphy, Ann Shenfield, Paul Fletcher, Robert Stephenson and Victorian College of the Arts, School of Film and Television
